node.data: {"Inicio":"Home","Servicios":"Services","Reservas":"Bookings","Catalogos":"Catalogs","Tours":"Tours","Descripcion":"More than 250 species of orchids, ornamental plants, viewpoint for observing hummingbirds, birdwatching trails, butterflies, amphibians and the coffee route.","Ir":"Go","seccion-servicios":"Our Services","service1-titulo":"Guided tours in Botanical Garden","service1-descripcion":"Our garden is home to orchids, heliconia, ferns and other species of plants from our region.","service2-titulo":"Guided visits to the hummingbird observatory","service2-descripcion":"Enjoy nature and especially our viewpoint for observing hummingbirds.","service3-titulo":"Restaurant and drinks","service3-descripcion":"Special dishes, excellent service and the feeling of living an adventure in a tropical environment.","service4-titulo":"Coffee route","service4-descripcion":"Our garden is home to orchids, heliconia, ferns and other species of plants from our region.","service5-titulo":"Viewpoint and trails for bird watching","service5-descripcion":"Take a tour of our trails ideal for observing birds, butterflies and amphibians.","service6-titulo":"Walks in the forest and visit to waterfalls","service6-descripcion":"Walk surrounded by an exuberant variety of native flora and fauna with the option of cooling off in the crystal clear waters of the falls.","seccion-habitaciones":"Our Rooms","seccion-catalogues":"Our Catalogues","habitacion-solo":"","habitacion-doble":"","habitacion-triple":"","habitacion-reserva":"Reserver Room","habitacion-reserva-nombre":"Names","habitacion-reserva-apellidos":"Last Name","habitacion-reserva-correo":"Email","habitacion-reserva-telefono":"Cellphone","habitacion-reserva-fechallegada":"Arrival Date","habitacion-reserva-fechasalida":"Departure Date"}
